## ğŸ”„ Alternative Approaches

Based on our analysis, we recommend considering:

1. **TypeScript/Node.js** for AI agent development (richer ecosystem)
2. **Hybrid approach** (TypeScript + Rust for performance-critical parts)
3. **WebAssembly** integration for browser/Node.js compatibility

## ğŸ“š Educational Value

This project demonstrates:
- Modern Rust async/await patterns
- Concurrent tool execution in AI agents
- Terminal UI development with React + Ink
- Clean architecture in systems programming
